about.title: About Karina
about.description: A dedicated and enthusiastic graduate of University of Mindanao with a degree in Education, committed to creating a positive and engaging learning environment. I have developed skills in lesson planning, classroom management, and student engagement through my academic training and teaching experiences. I am eager to create a positive, inclusive, and motivating learning environment where students feel supported and encouraged to reach their full potential. Passionate about teaching and inspiring students to reach their full potential, I aim to foster academic growth, character development, and lifelong learning in every classroom I serve.

skillCards.title: I. Career Advancement
skillCards.description:
1. Take licensure examination
2. Attend professional development training
3. Take leadership roles in school

skillCards.title: II. Financial Stability
skillCards.description:
1. Apply for promotion
2. Develop additional income sources
3. Practice financial planning and saving

skillCards.title: III. Health and Wellness
skillCards.description:
1. Maintain work-life balance
2. Engage in regular physical activity
3. Practice mental and emotional wellness

skillCards.title: IV. Community Engagement
skillCards.description:
1. Participate in outreach programs
2. Build strong parent-teacher relationships
3. Collaborate with fellow educators

skillCards.title: V. Added Skills
skillCards.description:
1. Enhance digital literacy skills
2. Develop research skills
3. Improve communication skills

skillCards.title: VI. Personal Satisfaction
skillCards.description:
1. Witness student growth
2. Create positive classroom environment
3. Practice continuous self-improvement
